sentences.sentence: Merry Christmas, Santie! So, you call yourself a Mountie! You can't catch me! Why, you couldn't even catch a cold!
sentences.translation: 圣诞快乐，圣诞老人！那么，你叫自己是皇家骑警。你抓不到我！为什么，您甚至不会得感冒！

sentences.sentence: So the "mountie", as a member of this police force is known, is not, in fact, often mounted except on a powerful motor-cycle.
sentences.translation: 因此作为警察中最具有力度一员的加拿大骑警也并非名富其名了，经常见的是骑着摩托车巡逻的骑士们。
